entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CreateDescriptionItems should not load document text on the UI thread #68104
  • the tree-view resets to the top whenever the model is updated, making is so you lose your place in the tree. #68103
  • As you navigate in a file, the selected item in the view will be updated, but will not scroll into view. So finding that item is extremely challenging (in large files). #68102
  • Sort state is not preserved across VS sessions. #68100
  • SearchBar lacks history, as well as normal `x` adornment to clear the search #68098
  • Sort buttons do not show their state, making it unclear what the current sorting state is #68096
  • [LSP] Support URIs as a first class document property #68083

Closed

  • Document outline should do shorter qualification for explicit interface methods #65714
    17.6 P3
  • Document outline should distinguish members with multiple overloads #65713
    17.6 P3
  • IntelliSense/Auto-complete off-by-one on overload count on members of lambda argument objects #61343
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33703.465 #68085

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix detection of nested symbols in Document Outline #68107
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Avoid waiting on the thread pool when there is no work to do #68106
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Check if DocCookie is int instead of uint #68105
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Move a few types related to pattern matching to be structs instead of classes. #68101
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ServiceHub vsix for ARM64 #68099
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delete unnecessary O# service #68097
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use a proper tool bar in Document Outline #68094
    Area-IDE, IDE-Navigation, untriaged, Navigation-Document Outline
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #68092
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Enable document outline by default #68088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Report only warning for `ref` argument at `in` parameter #68087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • IDE1006: Support multiple underscores #68086
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Feature - IDE1006

Merged

  • Check ISymbolRenamedCodeActionOperationFactoryWorkspaceService is null when rename #68095
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix number of additional overloads on lambda parameter's member recommendations #68028
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Use AsNullable helper method where appropriate #68091
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid task allocations for TextDocument.GetTextAsync #68090
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68093
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move potential expensive task of ItemManager to ThreadPool #68082
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Create new vsix for x64 .NET ServiceHub services #65471
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Update DiaSym version details #68080
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #68089
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix up implementation for parameterless requests. #68077
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add SelectAsArrayAsync which allows passing state explicitly #68071
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Val/revert66430 17.6 #67849
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Use a weak event handler pattern for GlobalOptionService #68062
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #68084
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Use client languageId when file path is ambiguous #68010
    Area-IDE, LSP, untriaged
  • Break cycles in attribute binding #68067
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Avoid rooting document instances in NavigateToSearchResult #68068
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Finalize testing and implementation around object initializers for inline arrays. #68064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Display standalone parameter names by default #67857
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pool `BindingDiagnosticBag`s #67954
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Remove the ` bool IsUnsafe(this TypeSymbol type)` method #67831
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Convert BindingDiagnosticsBag into a struct #68046
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations observed in local trace opening Roslyn.sln #68076
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Preserve removed entries in `SyntaxNodeProvider` #67636
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.7
  • LSP.Range may request beyond length of file #68081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #67925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove non-generic BindingDiagnosticBag #68041
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add FilterTree/FilterSpan API on SymbolStartAnalysisContext and SymbolAnalysisContext #68052
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Performance-Scenario-Diagnostics
  • Use BatchFixer to fix all for naming violation #59452
    Area-IDE
  • Transform factory #68072
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
